courseDescription:
This free online Advanced Training Methods course is the last in the Training of Trainers suite of Alison certificate courses. It will give you an insight into analyzing and developing training methods for effective learning. Firstly, you will learn about the elements of effective role-playing and leadership styles. You will also learn about the managerial grid and contingency models.

Next, you will take a look at behavior modeling and how to develop a behavior modeling exercise for training purposes as well as sensitivity training. Then you will learn about how to conduct a cost-benefit analysis for training programs including how to determine the ROI of a training program. Lastly, the course will discuss the decision-making process, models, and various decision-making styles.

As a professional, decision-making skills are of the essence. Start this course on training methods today and develop your training and decision-making skills. This course will be of interest to trainers, students, researchers, and anyone with an interest in developing their training practices.
